title: initial startup, keeps restarting
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
erigon version 2021.10.3-alpha

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
Commit hash : 
a481376a81d1bba61b12502634aeccd2ab767d9c
#### Expected behaviour
I expect for a node to start syncing

#### Actual behaviour
The node starts to sync... and keeps restarting after 1-2 minutes

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Compile erigon... and start:

cd /opt
mkdir erigon
mkdir github && cd github
git clone --recurse-submodules -j8 https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon.git
cd erigon
git checkout stable
make
cp -r ./build/bin /opt/erigon/

/opt/erigon/bin/erigon --metrics --metrics.addr=127.0.0.1 --metrics.port=64451 --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090
